meanings.definition: A person who believes in the existence of a god or gods.
meanings.sent1: The theist prayed every night before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She met a theist at the church who shared her beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The theist joked that even the pigeons in the park believed in a higher power.
meanings.sent4: In the world of the theist, the sun was a daily reminder of divine presence.
meanings.sent5: The theist's faith shone brightly in times of darkness.
